name: Pong Remake (MuziksPH)
description:
This game is a remake of the famous early arcade game pong , created in the year 1972 by Allan Alcorn

History Of Pong;

Pong is a table tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics, manufactured by Atari and originally released in 1972. It was one of the earliest arcade video games and created by Allan Alcorn as a training exercise assigned to him by Atari co-founder Nolan Bushnell.
